Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, north of Lafyette's Blacksmith and Repairs.
Room.LongDescription: Lafyette's Blacksmith Shop offers superior and quality craftsmanship in the repair of armor and weaponry, But Lafyette is a simple man, and does not guarantee anything. (Nor do his competitors.) Like all blacksmiths in the Land of Mordor, he has an aversion to enchanted items and will tell you it is difficult to repair items without them losing that special magical glow.
